amendment.description: To permit certain qualified aliens and immigrants access to public and assisted housing consistent with the intent of the 1996 welfare and immigration reform legislation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 224 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 224 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bond. (consideration: CR S1412; text: CR S1412) To permit certain qualified aliens and immigrants access to public and assisted housing consistent with the intent of the 1996 welfare and immigration reform legislation.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 224 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 224 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bond.
